00025 class CookieManager {
00026   public:
00027   class WorkerHolder;
00028   class StoreWorker;

00034   struct CookieData {
00035     gaia::base::String mName;  // !< Name of cookie.
00036     gaia::base::String mValue;  // !< Value of cookie.
00037     gaia::base::String mDomain;  // !< Domain of cookie.
00038     gaia::base::String mPath;  // !< Path of cookie.
00039     int64_t mCreationDate;  // !< Creation date of cookie, milliseconds
00040                             // !< from Jan. 1, 1970.
00041     int64_t mExpiryDate;  // !< Expiry date of cookie, milliseconds from
00042                           // !< Jan. 1, 1970.
00043     int64_t mLastAccessDate;  // !< Last access date of cookie, milliseconds from
00044                               // !< Jan. 1, 1970.
00045     bool mSecure;  // !< is the cookie secure.
00046     bool mHttpOnly;  // !< is this cookie can only be applied in http.
00047     bool mHasExpires;  // !< does this cookie has available expiry date.
00048   };
00049

00060     public:
